title: Community Pharmacy Leadership and Patient-Centered Service Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pharmacological knowledge and understanding of public health concepts
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment with non-real-time collaborative tools

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more service improvement plans aligned with IHI Triple Aim goals through community pharmaceutical needs assessments.
Learners can formulate and execute team-based problem-solving strategies by applying leadership theories.
Learners can design and present community pharmaceutical innovation projects using digital platforms.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
